pages.title: Alter Blocks
pages.text: Blocks accepted for the Alter bases

pages.title: Block List Pg.1
pages.text: - $(item)Oak Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Stripped Oak Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Spruce Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Stripped Spruce Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Birch Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Stripped Birch Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Acacia Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Stripped Acacia Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Dark Oak Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Stripped Dark Oak Wood$()$(br)- $(item)Hay Block$()$(br)- $(item)Clay Block$()$(br)- $(item)Moss Block$()

pages.title: Block List Pg.2
pages.text: $(br)- $(item)Oak Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Spruce Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Birch Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Jungle Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Acacia Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Dark Oak Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Flowering Azalea Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Azalea Leaves$()$(br)- $(item)Warped Nylium$()$(br)- $(item)Crimson Nylium$()$(br)- $(item)Sand $()$(br)- $(item)Red Sand$()

pages.title: Internal Column
pages.text: The Center Column has to to be Liquid (Water or Lava) Source Blocks.$(br)- Any Waterlogged Block is acceptable.$(br)- To be able to use the Blue Chocobo, a waterlogged $(item)Slab$() topside, or waterlogged Upside down $(item)Stair$() are valid.
